C D G M O S V 
All Classes All Packages

C

checkPolls(int[]) - Method in class model.DicePoker
Method that shows player numbers of specific dice polls he got from a throw
controller - package controller
Controller package - responsible for data flow between logic(Model) and display(View)

D

DicePoker - Class in model
Base business logic model class that should represents player results
DicePoker() - Constructor for class model.DicePoker
 
displayMessage(String) - Method in class view.View
Simple method that display give message

G

GameSetup - Class in controller
Main controller class responsible for controlling data flow between model and view
GameSetup() - Constructor for class controller.GameSetup
 

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class controller.Main
static void function allows to run application, with or without dice polls parameters provided as arguments
Main - Class in controller
Main class that allows to run application
Main() - Constructor for class controller.Main
 
manageData(String[]) - Method in class controller.GameSetup
Heart of the application, controller of the data input and output
model - package model
Model package - responsible for business logic

O

OutOfRangePollException - Exception in model
Exception class, to throw exception
OutOfRangePollException(String) - Constructor for exception model.OutOfRangePollException
 

S

showDicesPolls(int[]) - Method in class view.View
Method that display dice figures

V

view - package view
View package - responsible for displaying information / data
View - Class in view
Class responsible for displaying data on the screen
View() - Constructor for class view.View
